form.label: User Watchlist Editor
form.description: Use this dashboard to add/update and remove users from the watchlist. To view (not search) all entries, enter a wildcard in the 'User' field, but be careful not to select the 'Delete' action with a wildcard in the User field, as this will delete all the watchlist entries. The list is sorted by most recently updated.

search.query: | inputlookup user_watchlist where _key="$user$" | rename _key AS user | table user creator editor created updated start end reference reason comment | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(created) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(updated) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(start) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(end)

| stats count | where count!=0 | append [| stats count | append [|rest /services/authentication/current-context | search NOT username="splunk-system-user" | stats values(username) as editor] | eval _key="$user$" | eval start=if(match("$period.earliest$","^\d+"),"$period.earliest$",relative_time(now(),"$period.earliest$")) | eval end=if(match("$period.latest$","^\d+"),"$period.latest$",relative_time(now(),"$period.latest$")) | eval reference="$reference$" | eval reason="$reason$" | eval comment="$comment$" | regex _key!="^\*$" | eval _time=now() | transaction _time | rename _time as updated | lookup user_watchlist _key OUTPUT created, creator | eval created=coalesce(created,updated) | eval creator=coalesce(creator,editor) | fields - count] | outputlookup append=t user_watchlist | search NOT _key="*" | inputlookup append=t user_watchlist | eval action="$action$" | search action="modify" OR (action="delete" AND NOT _key="$user$") | table _key creator editor created updated start end reference reason comment | sort 0 updated | outputlookup user_watchlist | rename _key as user | sort 0 - updated | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(created) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(updated) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(start) | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(end)
